title: Question 11
prompt: Which of the following statements is supported by the fact that there is no clear explanation about why HIV infections progress faster in some people than in others?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback: The fact that the progression of HIV to AIDS isn’t explained means that we don’t understand everything about the HIV virus. There is still information to be learned. Although the HIV virus is not completely understood, there is much that we do know about the HIV virus and AIDS that allows us to develop treatments and preventative measures.
